creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: tankard with cylindrical body, flat cover with serrated front edge; coin inset on cover (silver crown of Hungary; S-scrolled handle engraved with contemporary initials [PHJM]); corkscrew thumb piece; handle tip embossed with ram's head
inscription:
Mark

Engraved on handle are the initials:
  [B]
[I    H]
[I *  H]
markings: maker\'s mark stamped to right and left of handle: <HB>  crude capitals, conjoined, in a shaped shield
title: Tankard
